title: I Will Complete It!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Huff, huff......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Shizuku-chan, great job. You completed level three of the hell triathlon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Well, I made it...... Huff~, my legs are wobbly~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, Yoshiko-chan has said that before too. Here......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kyah!? Wha-what is this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Here, stretching yourself out like this feels good. There.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>......Ahh, you’re right. I feel the blood pumping through my veins~ Haha~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Shizuku-chan, you really pushed yourself, didn’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I thought that if I push myself today...... I can take a day off tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, yeah, good girl. Then how about I provide you with more service! An additional session!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Whaaaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
